thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location and Excellent Restaurant
thread.title_full: Great Location and Excellent Restaurant - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Jisty15
title: Great Location and Excellent Restaurant
text:
This hotel was very helpful during our stay. We had early tours and they packed us a breakfast and delivered to our room since we would miss the morning included breakfast.
The location is great for getting to all the major attractions and to the tour meeting areas. The restaurant upstairs was great for a glass of wine on the patio or a light snack in the middle of the day to rest before going out for the evening.
